text: Vice Admiral Mathew Quashie (23 March 1951 - 9 January 2020) was a Ghanaian naval officer. He was the twenty-ninth Chief of Defence Staff of the Ghana Armed Forces from 2013 through 2016. He also was the Chief of Naval Staff of the Ghana Navy from 3 April 2009 to 28 March 2013. He was born in Accra. Quashie died at an Accra hospital on 9 January 2020 from an illness at the age of 68.Former CDS Quashie dead ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Accra Category:African military people
title: Matthew Quashie
